modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod will allow the destruction of all trash/garbage bags and also the foul trash/garbage piles after you loot them.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod will allow the destruction of all trash/garbage bags and also the foul trash/garbage piles after you loot them.

This version will not destroy all the small waste bins you find in toilets/bathrooms (as they used same lootlist idâ€™s).

Keep your local zombie infested neighbourhood clean.

Please be aware that you must **start a new save** if you install this mod.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/Ragsy2145/alpha-19-modlets/-/archive/master/alpha-19-modlets-master.zip?path=Ragsy_Take_Out_The_Trash_V3_A19)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11266-ragsy-s-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Ragsy2145](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/ragsy2145/)
